title: The Gathering Storm
description: Storm and her sister are dragonkin, they travel through time to save important humans from certain death. Storm is sent to rescue Alexander from the clutches of another of their kin, Grail. It seems Alexander is Storms intended mates and Grail wants her for himself so they can start a new bloodline. Can Storm get to Alex in time and can she battle against the feelings of desire she feels for him.
author: Kathi S. Barton
